banner.title: Convenient and effective way to invest money
banner.text: Endowment life insurance solution for savings and investments.
banner.item1: Investments in accordance with the chosen strategy
banner.item3: Tax on profits received is calculated and withheld automatically

tab1Card1.title: Why should you invest in a Private Portfolio?
tab1Card1.desc2: There are no additional fees applied to contributions.
tab1Card1.desc3: Low administration fee, from 0.29% to 0.99% per year, depending on the strategy and investment amount.
tab1Card1.desc4: Additionally, your life will be insured for an amount of 2% of the investment value (accumulation amount).
tab1Card1.desc5: Possibility to specify one or more beneficiaries.
tab1Card1.desc6: Tax on profits received is calculated and withheld automatically at the time of payment of funds.
tab1Card1.desc7: Opportunity to receive a 20% personal income tax refund every year

tab1Card2.title: Investment management
tab1Card2.desc1: Investments will be made in accordance with the chosen strategy.
tab1Card2.desc2: Your investment portfolio is managed on your behalf by Alphahedge Holdings experts.
tab1Card2.desc3: With your investments managed by experienced experts, you no longer need to worry about which assets to invest in or when to change your asset mix within your strategy.
tab1Card2.desc4: Monitor your investment results at any time and receive monthly reports prepared by our experts.

tab2Card1.title: Aggressive growth strategy
tab2Card1.text: The goal of this strategy is to achieve maximum returns in the long term through diversified investments in equity securities (stocks). The strategy's assets are 100% invested in equity securities; however, depending on the market situation and to better achieve the strategy's goals, the share of investments in equity securities can be increased or decreased ranging from 70% to 100% of assets strategy portfolio.This strategy is suitable for investors who want to invest for a period of at least 10 years.

tab2Card2.title: Growth strategy
tab2Card2.text: The goal of this strategy is to increase the value of invested assets through investments with increased risk for a medium to long term. The goal is expected to be achieved through diversified investments in equity securities (stocks) and fixed income securities, including money market instruments. 75% of the strategy's assets are invested in equity securities. Depending on the market situation and to more successfully achieve the strategy’s goals, the share of investments in equity securities can be increased or decreased in the range from 60% to 90% of the assets of the strategy portfolio. This strategy is suitable for investors who are willing to take on higher risk and want to invest for a period of at least 7 years.

tab2Card3.title: Balanced strategy
tab2Card3.text: The goal of this strategy is a medium-term increase in the value of assets through investments with moderate risk. The goal is expected to be achieved through diversified investments in equity securities (stocks) and fixed income securities, including money market instruments. The strategy's assets in the amount of 40% are invested in equity securities. Depending on the market situation and to more successfully achieve the goal of the Strategy, the share of investments in equity securities can be increased or decreased in the range from 25% to 55% of the assets of the strategy portfolio.This strategy is suitable for investors with a medium-term investment period (at least 5 years).

tab2Card4.title: Real Value Strategy
tab2Card4.text: The goal of this strategy is a moderate increase in asset value through low-risk investments. Assets are primarily invested in bonds, including money market instruments. On average, 10% of the strategy's assets are invested in equity securities (stocks) to diversify investment risk and improve return potential. Depending on the market situation and to more successfully achieve the strategy’s goals, the share of investments in equity securities can be increased or decreased in the range from 0% to 20% of the assets of the strategy portfolio.The strategy is suitable for investors who are less experienced in financial markets and want to hold their investment portfolio for at least three years.

tab2Card5.title: Conservative strategy
tab2Card5.text: The goal of this strategy is to preserve asset value through diversified bond investments. Up to 100% of the strategy's assets are invested in bonds, including money market instruments.This strategy is suitable for investors who want to avoid large fluctuations in the value of their investments over a period of one year or longer.
